common.findDate: Find your next perfect date idea!
common.selectPreferences: Select your preferences and let us surprise you with a fun date idea

about.title: About Date-Find
about.description: Date-Find is your perfect companion for discovering exciting and unique date ideas. Whether you're looking for a romantic evening, an adventurous outing, or a creative activity, we've got you covered.
about.missionText: We believe that memorable dates don't have to be expensive or complicated. Our mission is to help couples create meaningful experiences together, regardless of their budget or preferences.
about.feature1: Diverse date ideas for every occasion

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or suggestion? We'd love to hear from you!

1.title: Backyard Camping
1.description: Set up a tent in the backyard, bring snacks, and stargaze under the open sky.

2.title: DIY Pizza Night
2.description: Make your own pizzas from scratch with fun toppings and enjoy a cozy night in.

3.title: Free Museum Day
3.description: Visit a local museum on their free admission day and explore art or history together.

4.title: Sunset Beach Walk
4.description: Take a romantic stroll along the beach during sunset, collecting seashells and enjoying the view.

5.title: Art Painting Challenge
5.description: Set up a painting station and challenge each other to create art based on a theme.

6.title: Board Game Night
6.description: Break out your favorite board games and enjoy some friendly competition with snacks.

7.title: Surprise Picnic
7.description: Pack a picnic basket with favorite foods and find a hidden spot in a local park.

8.title: Hot Chocolate Movie Marathon
8.description: Make delicious hot chocolate and watch your favorite movie series together.

9.title: City Bike Ride
9.description: Rent bikes and explore different neighborhoods in your city.

10.title: Farmer's Market Visit
10.description: Browse local produce and artisanal goods at your neighborhood farmer's market.

11.title: Bookstore Scavenger Hunt
